targets.queryText: SELECT CASE WHEN CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.margin_to_portfolio_pct') AS REAL) > 35 THEN 'CRITICAL: LTV > 35%' WHEN CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.margin_to_portfolio_pct') AS REAL) > 30 THEN 'WARNING: LTV > 30%' WHEN CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.drawdown_status.current_drawdown_depth_pct') AS REAL) < -15 THEN 'CRITICAL: Drawdown > 15%' WHEN CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.drawdown_status.current_drawdown_depth_pct') AS REAL) < -10 THEN 'WARNING: Drawdown > 10%' WHEN CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.coverage.derived_pct') AS REAL) < 95 THEN 'WARNING: Data Coverage < 95%' WHEN COALESCE(json_array_length(json_extract(payload_json,'$.missing_prices')), 0) > 2 THEN 'WARNING: Missing prices for ' || CAST(COALESCE(json_array_length(json_extract(payload_json,'$.missing_prices')), 0) AS TEXT) || ' symbols' END AS alert, as_of_date_local AS as_of FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.totals.margin_to_portfolio_pct') AS REAL) > 30 OR CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.drawdown_status.current_drawdown_depth_pct') AS REAL) < -10 OR CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.coverage.derived_pct') AS REAL) < 95 OR COALESCE(json_array_length(json_extract(payload_json,'$.missing_prices')), 0) > 2 ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 10;
